original_title: School van operators to reduce prices
original_body_lines: All Island School Van Operators' Association (AISVOA) Chairman Malsiri de Silva said today that they would reduce school van fares with the reduced fuel prices.
He told the Daily Mirror that, considering the total reduction of diesel prices compared to previous times and yesterday, the school van monthly fare should be revised.
However, the decision to revise the amount of fare will be taken tomorrow after the committee meeting, Silva said.
"We must grant the benefit of the recent fuel price reduction to the parents as they are fed up with the current economic crisis," he added. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
